scripts.mysql_docker_up: sudo docker run -it --rm --name mysql -p 3306:3306 -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=debezium -e MYSQL_USER=mysqluser -e MYSQL_PASSWORD=mysqlpw sample-image
scripts.kafca_connect: sudo docker run -it --rm --name kafka -p 9092:9092 --link zookeeper:zookeeper debezium/kafka
scripts.debezium_connect: sudo docker run -it --rm --name connect -p 8083:8083 -e GROUP_ID=1 -e CONFIG_STORAGE_TOPIC=my_connect_configs -e OFFSET_STORAGE_TOPIC=my_connect_offsets -e STATUS_STORAGE_TOPIC=my_connect_statuses --link zookeeper:zookeeper --link kafka:kafka --link mysql:mysql debezium/connect
scripts.kafka_watch: sudo docker run -it --rm --name watcher --link zookeeper:zookeeper --link kafka:kafka debezium/kafka watch-topic -a -k dbserver1.inventory.customers
